description._instruction: Enter a description of this protocol execution.

input._instruction: Add all inputs (subject state, tissue sample state, file instance or file bundle) used by this protocol execution.

lookupLabel._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this protocol execution that may help you to more easily it find again.

output._instruction: Add all outputs (subject state, tissue sample state, file instance or file bundle) generated by this protocol execution.

parameterSet._instruction: Add all important parameters grouped in context-specific sets that were used in this protocol execution.

preparationType._instruction: Add the initial preparation type for this protocol execution.

protocol._instruction: Add the protocol of this protocol execution.

semanticallyAnchoredTo._instruction: Add all anatomical entities to which the outputs of this protocol execution can be semantically anchored to.

studyTarget._instruction: Add all study targets of this model version.
